meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Shane Whitlock Bob Harris Robin Carroll Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6788.

div.div: Battle of the Decades: The 1990s game 3.

td.p: Shane Whitlock, a radiologist from Little Rock, Arkansas
Bob Harris, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Robin Carroll, an instructional designer and curriculum developer from Atlanta, Georgia

tr.td: BILL CLINTON
HOLIDAYS
"HANG" FIVE
LOGOS
THE FIRST INSTRUMENT HEARD
CARSON, DAILY

div.onmouseover:

(Alex: Say something.)
(Bob: Thanksgiving Day?)
...
(Alex: All right, you\'re at -$800. Go again, Bob.)
(Bob: I\'ve been there before.)
[Laughter]

St. Patrick\'s Day (March 17)

Bob
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Robin] "Yankee Doodle" got shortened to "doodle", got shortened to "[*]". Way to go.)
...
(Alex: [To Bob] Uh--oh!)
[Laughter]
(Alex: Wishful thinking, are we?)
RobinWhat is dude?
$5,600
BobWhat is stud?
$6,000
ShaneWhat is
$2,001
dude')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
